snippet.title: Infinite Idle: Online Clicker RPG | Development trailer
snippet.description:
Infinite Idle: Online Clicker RPG | Development trailer
Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3197860/Infinite_Idle_Online_Clicker_RPG/

Hold down the spacebar or left-click and join the action! Upgrade, grow stronger, and progress endlessly. Enjoy infinite fun with your simple yet powerful strategy to reach the top!
